job.title: Software Documentation Engineer
job.description: Position: Software Documentation Engineer<br><br>Will be responsible for all commercial and project needs for Telkom Tribe Travel Tourism (wonderin.id & travelaja.id)<br><br>Qualification:<br><br>- Min 1 years experience in same or related position<br>- Experienced in creating software documentation and diagram such as Usecase, UML, Flowchart, Activity Diagram, user guide, system documentation, testing documentation, etc.<br>- Good Knowledge of Database, ERD, DFD, or other Data model<br>- Familiar with Confluence/JIRA, Database, API, and Agile Methodology such as Scrum or Kanban is a huge advantage<br><br>Job Description:<br><br>- Create, update, and maintain all documentation each of software / product life cycle.<br>- write script, diagrams, and so forth for helping others to understand a system work<br>- Within a cross-functional team, collaborate with other developers, software architect, quality assurance, UI designer, UX researcher, product owner, and scrum master.<br>- Scripting for API Documentation and Mockup.<br>- Learn multiple tools for the job.<br>- Create data model, diagram, workflow, and so forth to assist technical team.
